amendment.description: To authorize the provision to Indian tribes of excess nonlethal supplies of the Department of Defense.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 3330 withdrawn in Senate.
Amendment SA 3330 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Daschle. (consideration: CR S7152-7160) To authorize the provision to Indian tribes of excess nonlethal supplies of the Department of Defense.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3330 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Daschle.
